website_summaries.verdict: It may be a less glamorous brand, but the Regenerist range continually tests top among many competitors.
pros: Fragrance-free, so also suitable for sensitive skin
Skin feels smoother in the morning and fine lines and wrinkles are diminished
Lightweight, and absorbs quickly without leaving skin feeling greasy
Uses moisture to plump skin cells
cons: The tub packaging means contents can dry up
Some found it beaded up upon application

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product!
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe what I received was olay. I’ve been using olay for 15 years, but what I received this time smelled different and broke out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: 61 years old!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful night cream. My skin looks radiant. I will definitely continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: PRSALSADANCER

customer_reviews.title: My face broke out in welts and cluster acne within two days of using this and only got worse until I discontinued
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and never had a problem. I was running low and decided to order from Amazon for the first time. Either the formula has completely changed in the last few months or this is not an authentic bottle of Olay that was sent to me. My face broke out in welts and cluster acne within two days of using this and only got worse until I discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: kk0329

customer_reviews.title: Saw more results with these cream than with Olay Regenerist in red jar
customer_reviews.text: I noticed an immediate improvement in my skin within a week of using it. I typically use the microsculpting cream in the red jar, but feel the consistency of this cream is a much better fit for my skin. I use this one at night and the one in the red jar during the day. I've actually noticed more results with fine lines around my eyes than I have using the red jar. Very happy with this and plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on the higher priced night creams!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Recommended by dermatologist as next best line of beauty regime products if you can't afford the top of the line type. I use this sparingly, a little goes a long way, perhaps this is helpful to this reviewers that complained about it not all being absorbed. Also use Regenerist eye cream, no more dry Crepy eye skin when applying makeup. I use the serum, & moisturizer with SPF 30 in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance free-oh, happy nights!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Oil of Olay products since I was in my twenties. Just recently, I've started using night cream. Most of them have such a strong, perfume-like scent that they actually keep me awake. This one is fragrance free and seems to work well. I will keep using it while all the other smelly night creams age in the back of the bathroom cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Mugwumper

customer_reviews.title: Bedtime treat
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick and delicious cream for my face. I love putting it on before I sleep. My skin really appreciates it, especially in winter!
customer_reviews.author: catwoman7

customer_reviews.title: This is not Oil of Olay😡
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely not Oil of Olay. I've been using Oil of Olay for YEARS and whatever is in this jar is not it. First, the box came unsealed, and looks as if has been used. The jar was thrown in and sideways. The cream inside was grainy, rather than smooth like the actual Oil of Olay cream. It also smelled completely different. I am not putting whatever this is on my face. Definitely returning!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kromer

customer_reviews.title: Contains irritants, had to return
customer_reviews.text: Whatever chemicals are used in this product are too harsh for my skin. I don't have a sensitive skin, but this cream created severe irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie D

customer_reviews.title: This caused my skin to have a bad reaction complete with breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This caused my skin to have a bad reaction complete with breakouts, extreme dryness and sensitivity. I’ve never had a reaction like this to any product before. The lotion also pills and peels off. Would not recommend. I am returning this immediately and going back to cerave night cream!
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: I think this might be a fake.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Olay products for a long time, including this cream. I've never had any issues or allergic reactions, except this time when I purchased the same cream on Amazon instead of at the store. Not only does it not work as well as the one from the store, but it gave my face a rash. Beware of this product as it might be a fake version.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Kilamyan

customer_reviews.title: TOO GREASY!!! ICK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to liking this product. Been a daytime wearer of OoO Regenerist for six years and love, love, love it. The night time formula stays greasy-feeling for over an hour after I apply in the evening, even with toner use and exfoliating. I just don't feel it's the same quality cream as the daytime, red jar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: and it pilled up like little boogers on my face
customer_reviews.text: I put a thin layer on my face and neck. Fifteen minutes later, it was still incredibly oily. I tried to rub it in more, and it pilled up like little boogers on my face. Super gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews about how great this product was but, again, I keep having to learn my lesson that nothing but nothing is going to make a difference in the lines on my face at this age. Any old cheap face cream does exactly the same. I use and have used Lubriderm for Sensitive Skin for the past 15 years and every once in a while I get a wild hair to try some new product - waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mardi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible burn around my eyes from using this product .... I couldn’t even use it two days. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: monica stybel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night cream
customer_reviews.text: Someone literally asked what I had been using a week after I started this because of the improvement in my complexion. Not greasy, no scent. Perfect night cream.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Timeless brand with flawless results!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Goes on like SILK! Not sticky or heavy whatsoever. This product produces REAL results and has done wonders for my skin. I can almost feel my skin absorbing the product immediately. I just turned 30, and have been using Olay's facial products for the past 10 years. I remember being a little girl, and my Grandmother raving about her "Oil of Olay" cream and how important it was to moisturize before bed. Needless to say, I took her advice, and my skin looks great. The Olay brand is truly timeless and unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: crystalnicole

customer_reviews.title: Red pimples
customer_reviews.text: This cream caused horrible red pimples around my cheeks. I'm really sad 😔
customer_reviews.author: CaroBertdillo

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was going to help my face and after 2 days of using it it broke out my face into red bumps and I regret ever using this on my skin. EXTREMELY disappointed. DONT BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Walker

customer_reviews.title: great improvement to my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in my nightly beauty regimen for two weeks and I can honestly say I have noticed a difference. It doesnt leave an oily greasy feel to my skin and soaks in quickly. I did have a few days transition as my skin got used to the extra moisture. I got a few pimples, but once they my skin grew accustomed no more issues!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The cream is great for those of us who are scent sensitive. However, this jar is a nightmare for even the most able of hands. I had a terrible time initially opening the jar and then accidentally put the inner lid on upside down and had to BANG the glass jar against my counter to break the suction and open it. Absolutely terrible packaging. The handle on the inner lid is entirely too small and my fingernails keep getting damaged from trying to grip it.
customer_reviews.author: Piggy

customer_reviews.title: At first it was great! I almost thought I found an amazing product ...
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review of this night cream.... At first it was great! I almost thought I found an amazing product that I couldn't live without in my nightly routine! BUT THENNNNN..... I had a dermititis flare up! A HUGE one! I have only had a few my entire life, and I truly believe this product brought on a flare up in full force!
customer_reviews.author: ChazMaster

customer_reviews.title: I like oil of Olay but the night cream is gluey
customer_reviews.text: I like oil of Olay but the night cream is gluey. Maybe that’s a good thing but it peels away while sleeping and is noticeably if you wake up wiping your face now and again. The day moisturizer is amazing. I use it all over my body. Mostly my hands. Love the feel on my hands and decloté.
customer_reviews.author: marimars

customer_reviews.title: Great product (I've used it for a while) , received in horribly used condition - gross!
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but I received a used box. The box was damaged, and it had some of the product on top of the plug and around the rim and it was not as full as they ordinarily are. I'm not going to use it, as the expiration countdown starts when it's opened & idk when that was, plus, who knows what was put it in, intentionally or contaminated by someone's dirty fingers... I like buying from Amazon for these types of things, it's just easier - but if I keep getting used beauty products, I won't keep buying. Again, the 1 star is for the condition of the product I received, not the product under normal circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Deaton

customer_reviews.title: A giant air bubble?!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but Ridiculously small for the price. Air bubble is huge, this is just the top!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mercier

customer_reviews.title: Seeing a big improvement after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a week but I'm already seeing a big improvement in my skin tone. Being in my late 50's, I've experienced a lot of drying and roughness on my face that I never had when I was younger. I've tried several serums and moisturizers, micro planing, exfoliating, but nothing really helped....until now. This product has greatly smoothed and moisturized my face like nothing I've tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Too dry and felt cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I always dislike Olay beauty products for many reasons. I wished I didn't have to order this night cream. I'm 55 years old and already have some wrinkles. After using this cream for a few weeks, they made my facial skin feel so dry, less smooth, and not enough radiant, even under my makeup. Also, they make my eyes look tired and puffy. The cleanser did not remove my makeup entirely. So I returned all of my Olay products. All natural chemical-free beauty products are much better than any of those Olay products.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: This product is great...however...
customer_reviews.text: I no longer buy any cosmetics/make-up on Amazon. There are too many that seem to be counterfeits of the products selling at retail stores. I'd rather pay a little more and get the real thing. As far as this night cream, It's wonderful. I now mix it with my prescription Retin A cream (restores collagen) to keep my skin soft and glowing. No one can believe I'm 76! I also use hyaluronic acid with Vit.C (slows loss of collagen) in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell at all!! And it stays with you for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Setoucha

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight and I like that the product is fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product. I have noticed right away that my skin feels smoother and softer, and a lot less dry patches on my face. It's light weight and I like that the product is fragrance free. The only negative is that so far I have not seen an improvement in the appearance of my fine lines hopefully this will improve over time as I have only been using the cream for 4 nights but for how smooth and soft my skin feels I will continue to use this cream in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: MR B A KERR

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: The thing I dislike the most about this product is it leaves an oily mark on my pillow. I don't feel that the cream ever really absorbs into my skin and has ruined most of my pillowcases. The cream has no fragrance, which most people would like, but I was looking for something luxurious, silky, effective, and soft-smelling to soothe my skin at night time. I don't know that it's made much of a difference in my skin. Admittedly, I don't use it that often becasue of the pillow issue. Also, my husband doesn't enjoy when it gets on him while he tries to snuggle. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Even better than Estee Lauder or Lancôme.
customer_reviews.text: I love Olay moisturizers. They are just as good as the thousands of dollars are used to spend on department store moisturizers. I will say this, however, Olay (which, when I was a child was called Oil of Olay) has progressed so far that there is almost no difference between any of their high-end moisturizers at this point. Regenerist is as good as Olay products go. Buy anything more expensive and you’ll find its identical. They have an EXCELLENT marketing dept.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Been using this specific product for over a year now and oil of olays face analysis just put me 12 year's older than what I am. I've consistently used Olay products for over 20 year's. That's a big no brainier that it's not working..
customer_reviews.author: Letitia Braley

customer_reviews.title: This product did not improve the appearance of my skin....
customer_reviews.text: After using this whole container I did not see any improvement in my skin's appearance. It did not correct the fine lines around my mouth or eyes. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Olay has much better products - Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: UGH!! Very disappointed, especially with it being an Olay product - they always have such great stuff otherwise...Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin soft
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It makes my skin super soft. The cream looks thick, but absorbs quickly. Your skin is soft already when you put it on, but the next day your skin is even softer. I have sensitive skin and it doesn't make me red or burn. It also doesn't have a scent which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and as much as I love olay products, this made my skin break out. I do not like this cream and it does not work (in my experience). The serums do well however a thumbs down for this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonist

customer_reviews.title: Are you an adult with (light) acne? This product is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: As a woman who still gets the occasional breakout at the age of 40something, this is one of the best products I have used for helping those evil bastards heal up with minimal redness and scarring. A little every night before bed goes a long way giving you your best possible skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kadymae

customer_reviews.title: Not real Oil of Olay- burned my skin
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this is a real Oil of Olay product. It absolutely destroyed the area around my eyes, even since stopping use I still have open wounds that are trying to heal. My skin is NOT sensitive at all and I’ve used Oil of Olay products since I was a teen. Just spend the extra $5 get the real product from the drug store
customer_reviews.author: Maggie N

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it immediately and noticed that my skin felt more oily and I got a couple of whiteheads. Thought maybe it was just my skin so I started washing it differently and then used it, but it didn't change. Put it away for about a month and a half. Used it again for the first time last night and woke up this morning with whiteheads.
customer_reviews.author: SNT

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. Makes my skin feel silky smooth. I haven’t noticed a big change in my fine lines but it still makes my skin feel good. I have very sensitive skin and haven’t had an irritation or redness woh this product. Definitely a plus! Also doesn’t take a lot to cover my face. So the jar should last me a good while.
customer_reviews.author: N. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is produced directly from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the age of still having acne and getting fine lines.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only night cream I will use. I try other and always come back to this. My skin looks great, it keeps the redness down, and it just looks overall healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible cream.. Does not absorb into skin and rubs off in flakes. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn201

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t bad, but is not my favorite. I cycle through a few different night creams for variety. This works okay. Not bad for the price, though! Arrived on time and with no damage! I think that other creams I use in similar price range are more moisturizing and plumping.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Delgaudio

customer_reviews.title: Little dab will do ya!
customer_reviews.text: I have normal skin it spread like butter. Little bit goes a long way. I’m turned 60 with very few wrinkles. Dries clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Great for 40s skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many high dollar brands, and still come back to this line of moisturizer. I’m late 40s with sensitive skin and like a thick and rich moisturizing lotion feel. This works great for me and still feels good the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: My skin began to break out after using
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to the effectiveness of this product as I did not use it for long enough. I had been using the classic oil of olay night cream and thought it was time to try something that may be a little stronger. I used it for approximately two weeks and my skin began breaking out, which is unusual. I have since gone back to my old standby and am no longer having that problem. Other people may not have this issue but I thought it may be helpful for others with more sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Very good moisturizing night creame
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. No doubt it is a very good moisturizing night creame. But I don't know whats wrong with the delivery of this product, everytime there is some delivery issue. That is the only reason I am not giving it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kamalendu

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to love this night cream, but it's a big disappointment. As advertised it is unscented and has a light, creamy texture. I felt the $20 price seemed reasonable for a quality cosmetic product. I applied it before bed for 2 nights and both mornings I've awakened to dry surface lines all over my face. Normally my skin is neither too oily nor too dry. Needless to say, I won't be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction caused by cream
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but this cream caused some kind of reaction on my skin. I broke out in tiny, itchy bumps all over my face and neck. I don't usually have sensitive skin and it's the first time I ever have a reaction like this. But, other than that, its fragrance free and wish it would've worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good product, see quick results
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this, but so far so good. I use it every other night for now because I thought I was having a reaction to it after two nights in a row, but now I think it was a reaction so something else. I plan to work my way up to trying it every night again. I do feel like I see a difference in my skin overnight. I have deep forehead lines and thats where I notice the improvement the most. I’m excited to continue using it and see how much better my skin can get.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream
customer_reviews.text: I typically have sensitive skin and am a little oily. This does great at moisturizing at night before bed and works all though the night. I do have naturally combination skin so I do wake up and my face tends to be more oily after this rod cut but I wash my face in the morning so it does not matter - it definitely lives up to the moisturizing part of the product. You only need a little bit for your neck and face and this product will go a long way!
customer_reviews.author: emily parker

customer_reviews.title: Alright cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream applies very smoothly and feels very rich. My skin feels soft and moisturized in the morning, but the one thing I don't like about this is that if I didn't slather on the cream, it felt too dry on my skin, so I always have to use more of this cream than I would compared to a different brand.

customer_reviews.title: Want a rash? Steer clear otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Day one was amazing, my skin felt so smooth, so hyrdrated...and then I woke up to a mild rash around my mouth and nose area. I guess this is what I get for trying to go back on vegan products...sticking to only those from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Elleveeh

customer_reviews.title: Silky yet rich
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect moisturizer; silky smooth going on yet rich enough to last through the night. I was so pleased that it is actually unscented. I'll wear scents sometimes, but they can be obnoxious; this moisturizer feels clean and hydrating without any distractions. I definitely recommend. Also I tried the day moisturizer in the red tube by Olay. Not as crazy about that one which has a scent and lacks the silkiness I love in this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Van Deutekom

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a counterfeit product. I’ve used this exact cream before but purchased from the store. The cream I received from amazon is very different. It’s caused a burning feeling and flakes and falls apart when applied, none of which I’ve had problems with in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Emily James

customer_reviews.title: What's up Olay?
customer_reviews.text: I like Olay products (and love the red Regenerist line), but am very disappointed with this product. With a good night cream, my skin feels plump and soft when I wake up. This makes almost no difference. When I wake up my skin has a dry, end of the day feel, NOT the moisturized, morning feel. It's basically better than nothing. I also have that wasted money feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Cream
customer_reviews.text: There is no dislike over her concerning Olay Night Cream. I am very impressed with it. I have very sensitive skin on my faced and to be able to sleep with any cream and feel refreshed the next morning is a plus for me. My face feels so soft and smooth each morning. Having said that. I can go a night without using it that is how well OLAY night cream works.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Promising Olay product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well - face feels smoother but lotion leaves a light coat on surface of skin that takes getting used to for me - I like a good clean feel. I will review again in a month to see if any more longer term effects take place.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Y

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great results.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is super sensitive and I didn’t have problems with this, so that’s a big win for me! Also, I started to see results with my fine lines after about a week, and it only got better with more use.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Maser

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper online!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon. I have purchased this for over 10years at I think anywhere between $22.00 to $30.00. So excited to find it at such a great price!! This stuff is amazing. Everything seems to break my face out with a rash, this is the only thing I have found that doesn't. I would recommend this for all day use - not just for night. It's not greasy feeling and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Keep the packaging in case you need to return!
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT work for me. I usually love Olay products, but my face seemed to be “burned” in spots on my face when I used this product. Areas on my face seemed to peel....almost like after a little sun burn. There is no way to rerun it without the original packaging which I didn’t keep because I was so sure about this product based on reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this product at all!
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product at all. It sat on my skin and never fully sank in. My face started breaking out almost immediately, I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Lynettej

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing. Made wrinkles a little worse if anything. I go back to Olay as it smells ok and feels good. I’m always disappointed with the lack of results promised though.
customer_reviews.author: scf

customer_reviews.title: I used this product for years and loved it. Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for years and loved it. Loved it. Wore it both night and day. I am almost 70 yet people constantly commented on my youthful wrinkle free dewey skin. Then it was hard to find and finally it was back... but with new packaging and a different formula. I do not care for it at all. Not at all. The former formula left my skin feeling soft and moist. This does not. I wished I had sent it back while the return window was open. Very unhappy with the changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Swack

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, Healing, Non-greasy
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing, non-greasy, melts into ur skin. Very dry areas have been eliminated. I work outside a lot and have had chapped areas. Have been using the Regenerist nightcream and the Regenerist daytime sp25 for weeks now and they have eliminated the chapped skin an even repaired damaged areas. I put more cream on problem areas but expect i will apply more sparingly during summer months. Very happy with this product. It works for me!
customer_reviews.author: groucho

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes but not sure it is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly without any damage. I generally like and use the Olay line of skin care products, but this night cream is not my favorite. It didn't seem to really add that much moisture overnight, especially for the price. The texture reminded me of a basic cold cream, which is much less expensive. Currently, I prefer the Olay luminous overnight facial mask gel in combination with the red regenerist day moisturizer, eye cream, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hasal

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love using this product at night. Great quality for moisturizing my skin overnight. Does not leave my skin greasy or oily. It is fragrance free which I appreciate. I have had no reactions or pimples using this product. I plan to reorder soon. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this with the Olay Regenerist lotion and had a horrible reaction. I tried cutting out foods, but determined that the problem was from the Olay creams that I had started using. I wanted to like this. It smells great and seems like a great lotion but my skin reacted horribly.
customer_reviews.author: AMac

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to feel like the Micro-Sculpting Creme, thick and greasy. Instead, this Night Recovery Creme is much lighter, smoother, and has zero fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Regenerist is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: As an aging woman I began to notice a change in the texture and tone of my skin and I didn't like it. There are tons upon tons of skin care brands and products on the market. I wondered whic would be good for me, giving me the results I was looking for. I kept seeing Olay's Regenerist commercials and figured I would give it a try. I LOVE this night cream and after just 2 weeks of consistent use I can already see a difference. I will purchase this again and I'm looking at other products in the Regenerist line. Excellent, Excellent, Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half-empty jar of lotion sent.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy from Pharmapacks. Lotion had been previously opened and was about half full.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Really plumps up your skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really works for me. I had this wrinkle or deep line between my eyebrows for a very long time (due to aging of course!) Since I've used the night cream for a month now, that wrinkle is almost gone. This cream leaves a velvety feel on your skin, it easily absorbs on your skin and not leave a sticky feel. Great product, highly recommended. Works great!!!
